entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 10:48 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
